root.name: Cricket Revolution
root.description: GameplayThis is a multiplayer cricket game with leaderboards and international challenges.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows 2000/NT/XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium 4, 2.0GHz processorMemory: 512 MB RAM (1 GB for Vista)Graphics: 128 MB supported video cardDirectX®: 9.0c or laterHard Drive: 1 GB availableSound: DirectX compatible sound cardRecommended:OS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: Intel® 2.4 GHz Dual Core processorMemory: 1 GB RAM (2 GB for Vista)Graphics: 256 MB 6600 Nvidia graphics card or ATI equivalentDirectX®: 9.0c or laterHard Drive: 1 GB availableSound: DirectX compatible sound card
